column4: Hello everyone, i'm trying to find out how to get rid of all trace of Ubuntu on my system. I tried installing it from the disc and dual booting. Now it's screwed up so i want to do a completely fresh install.
Just reinstall, the partitioner will reformat those partitions for you.
then go to Add/Remove Programs in Windows and uninstall
Also, the Desktop CD has gparted ... you can use that to shrink your NTFS partition.
